summary.para: Receives notification when an optical media device is added to the computer.

param.name: object
param.para: An interface that you can use to enumerate the devices on the computer.
This parameter is a MsftDiscMaster2 object in script.

param.name: uniqueId
param.para: String that contains an identifier that uniquely identifies the optical media device that was added to the computer.

summary.para: Receives notification when an optical media device is removed from the computer.

param.name: object
param.para: An interface that you can use to enumerate the devices on the computer.
This parameter is a MsftDiscMaster2 object in script.

param.name: uniqueId
param.para: String that contains an identifier that uniquely identifies the optical media device that was added to the computer.

summary.para: Implement this interface to receive notification when a CD or DVD device is added to or removed from the computer.
